meanings: (책임감이 없음) lack of a sense of responsibility, irresponsibility, 무책임하다 (be) irresponsible, lack a sense of responsibility

vlive.korean: [옜다 받아라 무책임한 애드리브] 갑자기 R&B로! [Take my endless ad-lib] Suddenly, it's R&B. 듣기 View video NCT LIFE / 심포유 - my SMTelevision : [심포유 #첸] #최초공개 #심포유OST #아름다워 #녹음비하인드
vlive.english: [Take my endless ad-lib] Suddenly, it's R&B.

vlive.korean: 이런 무책임한 리더가 어디 있어! Such irresponsible leader! 듣기 View video IZ*ONE : 우리는 게임즈원🎯✌️
"무작정 믿는다는 것은 또다른 무책임"... "Trusting without any responsibility is not being responsible at all"... 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] AB6IX X LieV - AB6IX의 눕방라이브!
vlive.english: "Trusting without any responsibility is not being responsible at all"...

vlive.korean: 너무 무책임한 발언이었다. That was such an irresponsible comment. 듣기 View video JBJ95 : [#지금하95] 우리 DDP 갔다와쵸~^^
vlive.english: That was such an irresponsible comment.

vlive.korean: 진짜 너무 무책임한 말해요. He's so irresponsible. 듣기 View video ASTRO : 투제이의 777 아트쇼💜

examples.korean: Her casual dismissal of the threats seemed irresponsible. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀가 그 위협들을 예사로이 묵살하는 것은 무책임해 보였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Her casual dismissal of the threats seemed irresponsible. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It would be irresponsible to ignore the situation. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그런 사정을 무시하면 무책임한 일이 될 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It would be irresponsible to ignore the situation. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Her husband was a charming, but lazy and feckless man. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀의 남편은 매력은 있었으나 게으르고 무책임한 남자였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Her husband was a charming, but lazy and feckless man. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: His irresponsible attitude made me angry. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그의 무책임한 태도가 나를 화나게 했다. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: His irresponsible attitude made me angry. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Is free-range parenting irresponsible? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 아동의 자유를 우선시하는 양육은 무책임한 것일까? 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: Is free-range parenting irresponsible? Add to Wordbook
